definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Only people who have a certain amount of property can vote.
sentences.chinese: 也常常受人詬病，等級制是指有產者纔有投票權。

sentences.english: His actual focus was the protection of the rights of European men who owned property.
sentences.chinese: 他所關注的是保護歐洲男性有產者的權利。

sentences.english: And he led his little bourgeois away.
sentences.chinese: 於是他把小有產者帶走了。

sentences.english: In former times, only property owners could be registered as voters.
sentences.chinese: 從前，只有有產者才能登記爲選民。
